div.h2: Whatever you want, the possibilities are endless at AVA.
div.span: AVA Toluca Hills is a newly renovated living space in the diverse energy of Los Angeles – where bars and clubs converge with farmers markets, where sushi meets pizza and music collides with art. Oh yeah, and we’re just minutes away from the 101, 134, and 5 freeways. Our newly renovated studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments feature urban inspired designs that extend beyond your walls to refreshed amenity spaces to connect, chill, and play. Hang in the lobby loft, the outdoor or indoor chill space, or head to one of the pools. There’s the outdoor yoga deck plus our awesome fitness center and pool deck for chilling and grilling, and lots of comfy seating for hanging out with friends in social areas. We are eco-friendly and pet-friendly too (even big dogs). Now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Dive in and make it yours.

a.class: pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme

div.class: pricing-content-wrap specials d-flex justify-content-around flex-column z-index-over-content

button.class: pricing-cw-modal-trigger font-primary font-18 line-height-1 font-weight-light d-flex align-items-center flex-wrap btn btn-borderless font-primary-theme

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: We’ve got a variety of finish packages for you to choose from — choose one and then dive in and make it yours.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: Pet-friendly community with WAG Pet Park
EV charging stations View more details

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Give us a shout to learn more about AVA. We know you’ll like what we have to say.

li.a: Do Not Sell My Personal Information

","description":"AVA Toluca Hills is a newly renovated living space in the diverse energy of Los Angeles – where bars and clubs converge with farmers markets, where sushi meets pizza and music collides with art. Oh yeah, and we’re just minutes away from the 101, 134, and 5 freeways. Our newly renovated studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments feature urban inspired designs that extend beyond your walls to refreshed amenity spaces to connect, chill, and play. Hang in the lobby loft, the outdoor or indoor chill space, or head to one of the pools. There’s the outdoor yoga deck plus our awesome fitness center and pool deck for chilling and grilling, and lots of comfy seating for hanging out with friends in social areas. We are eco-friendly and pet-friendly too (even big dogs). Now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle.
